name: Love all you have left
description: Psychological thriller set at the Eastern-Front during World War II.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows xp Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics Storage: 350 MB available space
